name: Homework Overdue
description:
STORY:

In late 2005, a couple of 15 year old kids, tired of their abuse from a bully shoot up their school with the help of a teacher, with the goal of getting the bully, after a few hours the police arrived and tried to stop them but the teacher and students fought back and killed 2 police officers, and in turn got killed as well, after the bully hears about the news the next day he feels relieved that he didn't go to school that day but also guilty. 

8 months later, the bully's history teacher hands him a big assignment for the next day, annoyed, he goes to a computer in a library to hopefully finish it there, but he spent 2 hours trying to start it because the computer was trashed with viruses by other students, but when he did, the school was closed, it was 7pm and there was no way out ,and if it could get any worse, the souls of the bully's victims are stuck with him and ready for revenge.

HOW TO PLAY:

You are stuck in this small room with a computer in a big library inside a school in the middle of the night, you're goal is finish the homework while ghosts try to kill you.

  • BASICS: 

While the ghosts try and kill you, you must advance on the homework, to do that, you must go the text typer app and hold the mouse button while hovering over the advance button to type.

  • GETTING RID OF THE GHOSTS
  • Mark Smith (Loud ghost) - To keep this ghost away, you must check the radar app from time to time and check how close he is from you, if he is 15m away from you, you must immediately click the emergency sounds button below to send him back. 
  • Richard Brown (Glitch Ghost) - To prevent this ghost from killing you, you must listen carefully every time you go back to the home screen on the computer, if you hear a glitch sound, DO NOT OPEN ANOTHER APP, wait until you hear it again to do so. 
  • Anna Miller (The Teacher) - Every once in a while, you will hear someone whisper ''No games during class'' When you hear this, immediately pull the fire alarm by just clicking it.
  • Jacob Johnson (The Calm Ghost) This one is simple, when you hear walking sounds approaching, you must go to the home screen and wait a few seconds.
